nl.nikhef.xhtmlrenderer.swing

Interface ITemplatePanel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentListener, EventListener, org.xhtmlrenderer.simple.extend.FormSubmissionListener, IDocumentContainer, ITemplateContainer, IXHTMLPanel, org.xhtmlrenderer.extend.UserInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestWizard, TemplateButtonPanel, TemplatePanel, TemplateWizard

    public interface ITemplatePanel
extends ITemplateContainer, IXHTMLPanel
    Interface for TemplatePanel classes.

    This is mostly a IXHTMLPanel combined with the template functionality of ITemplateContainer.

    • Method Detail

      • getFormComponent

        Component getFormComponent(String name)
        Return the Swing/AWT component for a form element by name.

        Note that multiple radio buttons have the same name, so for these the name is actually in the form name.value.

        Parameters:
        name - like myfield in &gt;input type="text" name="myfield" /&lt;
        Returns:
        The Swing/AWT component, or null if not found.

      • getFormComponents

        Map<String,Component> getFormComponents()
        Return the list of Swing/AWT components.
        Returns:
        Readonly map of Swing/AWT components, indexed by their name.
        See Also:
        getFormComponent(java.lang.String)
